title: Judge Sri Skandaraja takes oaths as new Chairman of Sri Lanka Appellate Court
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Appeal Court Judge S. Sri Skandaraja took oaths before President Mahinda Rajapaksa as the new Chairman of the Court of Appellate, Court of Sri Lanka at the Temple Trees on Tuesday 28 June….
